Package io.github.shooter.game.weapons

Class Gun

java.lang.Object
io.github.shooter.game.weapons.Gun
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssaultRifle, SniperRifle, SubmachineGun
public abstract class Gun extends Object
Represents a generic gun in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Gun

      public Gun(String name, float damage, float fireRate, int magazineSize, float reloadTime, float bulletSpeed, float spread)
      Constructs a new Gun with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the gun.
      damage - The damage dealt by each shot.
      fireRate - The rate of fire in rounds per second.
      magazineSize - The size of the magazine.
      reloadTime - The time taken to reload in seconds.
      bulletSpeed - The speed of the bullets in units per second.
      spread - The spread of the bullets in degrees.
